article_title: Mustard Republicans: Jimmy Fallon’s dig at candidates for being “mild, spicy, brown and yellow”
article_text:
Topics: Ben Carson, Donald Trump, Hillary Clinton, Jeb Bush, Jimmy Fallon, Marco Rubio, tonight show, Video, x-files, Elections News, Entertainment News, News, Politics News

Jimmy Fallon rarely dives into the politics, but on Friday night’s “Tonight Show” he had a few political thank you notes.

“Thank you, Republicans and mustard, for being the only things that come in mild, spicy, brown and yellow,” Fallon joked with a photo of Jeb Bush, Marco Rubio, Ben Carson and Donald Trump.

Check out the rest of the video below for another special thank you note for Hillary Clinton and her X-Files:

article_metadata.description: Also writes a thank you note to Hillary Clinton for being dedicated to her own personal "X-Files." VIDEO
